activities: The organization has a need to process and use personal and sensitive data transferred from the EU to the organization in the US by hospitals, clinics, and doctors requesting laboratory services.  The organization will use this data in order to perform the requested tests and associated services and tasks.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: To ensure compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles, the organization will:  (a) use the services of the American Arbitration Association ("AAA") in the investigation and resolution of complaints and comply with advice given by the AAA; (b) periodically review and verify the organization's compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles.
